# 
I hereby certify that the correspondence to which this certificate is affixed, including each document referred to therein as being enclosed or submitted therewith, is being deposited with the United States Postal Service with sufficient postage as first class mail addressed to the Commissioner for Patents, P.0. Box 1450, Alexandria, VA 223 13-1450 on thedateshownbelow. 

PATENT 
# 
Inventor(s):  Kirvin L. Hodge, et al. Atty. Ref.: 18030-PCTUS   
Appl. No.: 10/531,630 Group Art Unit:   
Filed: April 14, 2005 Examiner:   
For: COMPOUNDS FOR THE TREATMENT OF METABOLIC DISORDERS 米 
July 18, 2005 
Commissioner for Patents P.O. B0x 1450 Alexandria, VA 22313-1450 
Sir: 
# 
Pursuant to 37 CFR 1.56, 1.97 and 1.98, the attention of the Examiner is directed to the documents listed on the enclosed Form PTO-1449. A copy of each listed document is enclosed. 
In addition, applicants enclose an International Search Report, dated October 15, 2004, in connection with corresponding International Patent Application No. PCT/US04/03718. Each of the documents listed in the Search Report is listed in the Form PTO-1449 enclosed herewith.

Inventor(s): Hodge, et al. Application No.: 10/531,630 Page 2 
Each of the documents WO 99/11255 and WO 99/19291, which are not in the English language, either contains or is accompanied by an English language abstract. 
It is believed that no fee is required in connection with the filing of this Statement. If any fee is required, the Commissioner is hereby authorized to charge the amount of such fee to Deposit Account No. 50-1677. 
Respectfully submitted, 
Lewis J. Kfeisler Reg. No. 38522 Attorney for Applicant(s) 
930 Clopper Road Gaithersburg, MD 20878 Phone: (240) 631-2500 x3276 Facsimile: (240) 683-3794
